#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(VSA_UT)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DBOOST_TEST_DYN_LINK) 

find_package(Boost COMPONENTS serialization unit_test_framework REQUIRED)
#find_package( OpenCV REQUIRED )

set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../../../../src/VisionSoilAnalyzer/Soil/Debug/libSoil.so ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../../../../src/VisionSoilAnalyzer/SoilMath/Debug/libSoilMath.so)
add_executable(VSA_UT VSA_UT.cpp)
target_link_libraries(VSA_UT -L/usr/local/lib -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_core -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_flann -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgcodecs -lopencv_ml -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_photo -lopencv_shape -lopencv_stitching -lopencv_superres -lopencv_ts -lopencv_video -lopencv_videoio -lopencv_videostab "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}"  ${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS} -lboost_serialization -lboost_unit_test_framework)
include_directories (/usr/local/include /usr/local/include/opencv ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS})
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -std=c++11")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++11")
